Name: Perdition Massacre
Details:
A chemical attack on the Taurian border system of Perdition that claimed 11,000 civilian lives. Protector Thomas Calderon was quick to blame his neighbors and rivals, the Federated Suns, for the attack.

The Perdition Massacre is the latest in a long string of diplomatic incidents that have raised tensions between the Federated Suns and the Taurian Concordat to a boiling point.
